experience.title: Actuarial Intern
responsibilities: Assisted in the preparation of quarterly rate filing exhibits for Personal Auto lines, ensuring compliance with state regulatory requirements.
Utilized SQL to extract and clean large datasets from claims databases, reducing data processing time by 15%.
Performed sensitivity analysis on loss reserve estimates using Excel VBA to automate repetitive calculation tasks.

experience.title: Actuarial Analyst
responsibilities: Conduct valuation and financial reporting for life insurance products under US GAAP and statutory accounting principles.
Support senior actuaries in developing pricing models for new health insurance products by analyzing historical claims trends.
Maintain and update Prophet models to project future cash flows and assess capital adequacy requirements.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to communicate actuarial findings and impact on business profitability.
